condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Central and decentralized health and environment authorities in targeted areas have improved capacity to legislate, budget, design, deliver and coordinate WASH services and interventions to mitigate the impact of air pollution on child survival.

description.narrative: WASH policies and capacity of local authorities was strengthened with technical support from UNICEF, through approval/update of water safety plans in 77% (48/62) of the target communities (soums) in three provinces. Climate-resilient WASH facility designs and demonstrations in the target areas were supported and promoted. National WASH service strategy development for achieving the SDG targets on WASH was advocated and developed as part of a national policy on public utility services. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
